work-1.title: Mobile Developer

work-2.title: .Net Developer Internship
work-2.description: I am mainly responsible for the company's official website, the daily operation of the page, management background page optimization. Work is very saturated, but in time to spare time to learn a lot of new frameworks and libraries and JQuery have a certain understanding-During this internship, I've improved my skills especially in developing front-end and back-end.

education-1.college: Université de Technology de Troyes, France
education-1.title: Engineer's Degree
education-1.description: Ever since I studied in France, I mainly learned such as operating systems, computer networks, JAVA, Android, assembly language, machine learning and so on.Since university and especially during my French Engineer Program, I've had the chance to work with researchers of various backgrounds on different subjects, mainly regarding systems mobiles,network protocols,website development through research projects at school. It's my pleasure, at an early point of my career, to have been able to discover these exciting projects which has also been helpful to my career planning.

education-2.title: Bachelor's Degree
education-2.description: I mainly studied such as C / C + + programming language, data structure, compilation principles etc during my three years in university. These basic knowledge lay a solid foundation for my study abroad in France- Besides, during the school I participated in community activities particularly in the 24-hour innovation contest, I won the second place in Asia's division.

project-1.title: Carrefour C-Zam & Carrefour Banque
project-1.description: The application allows you to activate, consult and manage your bank account as your wish.
